name: SPREAD (SOCIETY FOR PEACE RURAL EDUCATION AND AWARENESS DEVELOPMENT) SOCIETY
briefDescription: SOCIETY FOR PEACE RURAL EDUCATION AND AWARENESS DEVELOPMENT (SPREAD) was small NGO and  registered under Indian societies registration act 21 of 1860,Reg.No 265.Since its inception working in rural ares among the women and Children. The Organisation presently working in Kurnool DT of Andhra Pradesh
